description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Are you ready for addictive block breaking action?  Easy to pick up and play but only the truly skilled can master it! Fast paced gameplay in 4 difficulty levels and 20 stages spells tons of fun for either 1 or 2 players!
